entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
